import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams,useNavigate,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{Container,Box,Typography,Tabs,Tab}from'@mui/material';import axios from'axios';import MovieInfo from'../components/MovieInfo';import VideoPlayer from'../components/VideoPlayer';import EpisodeSelector from'../components/EpisodeSelector';import RelatedMovies from'../components/RelatedMovies';import CommentSection from'../components/CommentSection';import LoadingIndicator from'../components/LoadingIndicator';import ErrorDisplay from'../components/ErrorDisplay';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MovieDetail=()=>{const{slug}=useParams();const navigate=useNavigate();const location=useLocation();const[movie,setMovie]=useState(null);const[currentTab,setCurrentTab]=useState(0);const[currentEpisode,setCurrentEpisode]=useState(null);const[currentServer,setCurrentServer]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[relatedMovies,setRelatedMovies]=useState([]);// Lấy thông tin phim từ API
useEffect(()=>{const fetchMovieDetail=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);setError(null);const response=await axios.get("https://phimapi.com/phim/".concat(slug));if(response.data){setMovie(response.data);// Thiết lập tập phim mặc định
if(response.data.episodes&&Object.keys(response.data.episodes).length>0){const firstServer=Object.keys(response.data.episodes)[0];const firstEpisode=response.data.episodes[firstServer][0];const episodeId=typeof firstEpisode==='object'?firstEpisode.slug||firstEpisode.id:firstEpisode;setCurrentServer(firstServer);setCurrentEpisode(episodeId);}// Lấy phim liên quan
if(response.data.category&&response.data.category.length>0){const category=response.data.category[0].slug;fetchRelatedMovies(category);}}setLoading(false);}catch(err){console.error('Error fetching movie details:',err);setError('Đã xảy ra lỗi khi tải thông tin phim. Vui lòng thử lại sau.');setLoading(false);}};fetchMovieDetail();},[slug]);// Lấy phim liên quan
const fetchRelatedMovies=async category=>{try{const response=await axios.get("https://phimapi.com/v1/api/the-loai/".concat(category,"?page=1&sort_field=modified.time&sort_type=desc&limit=6"));if(response.data&&response.data.items){// Lọc bỏ phim hiện tại khỏi danh sách phim liên quan
const filtered=response.data.items.filter(item=>item.slug!==slug);setRelatedMovies(filtered.slice(0,6));}}catch(err){console.error('Error fetching related movies:',err);}};// Xử lý khi chọn tập phim
const handleEpisodeSelect=(episodeId,server)=>{setCurrentEpisode(episodeId);setCurrentServer(server);// Cuộn lên đầu trang khi chọn tập mới
window.scrollTo({top:0,behavior:'smooth'});};// Xử lý khi chuyển tab
const handleTabChange=(event,newValue)=>{setCurrentTab(newValue);};if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoadingIndicator,{message:"\u0110ang t\u1EA3i th\xF4ng tin phim..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorDisplay,{message:error,onRetry:()=>window.location.reload()});}if(!movie){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorDisplay,{message:"Kh\xF4ng t\xECm th\u1EA5y th\xF4ng tin phim."});}// Xác định URL video
const videoUrl=currentEpisode&&currentServer&&movie.episodes&&movie.episodes[currentServer]?movie.episodes[currentServer].find(ep=>{const epId=typeof ep==='object'?ep.slug||ep.id:ep;return epId===currentEpisode;}):null;// Xác định tên tập phim hiện tại
const currentEpisodeName=currentEpisode&&currentServer&&movie.episodes&&movie.episodes[currentServer]?movie.episodes[currentServer].find(ep=>{const epId=typeof ep==='object'?ep.slug||ep.id:ep;return epId===currentEpisode;}):null;const episodeTitle=typeof currentEpisodeName==='object'&&currentEpisodeName.name?currentEpisodeName.name:"T\u1EADp ".concat(currentEpisode);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{maxWidth:"xl",sx:{py:4},children:[videoUrl&&movie&&movie.name&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{mb:4},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VideoPlayer,{src:typeof videoUrl==='object'?videoUrl.link:videoUrl,title:"".concat(movie.name," - ").concat(episodeTitle)})}),movie&&movie.episodes&&Object.keys(movie.episodes).length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EpisodeSelector,{episodes:movie.episodes,currentEpisode:currentEpisode,onEpisodeSelect:handleEpisodeSelect}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{borderBottom:1,borderColor:'divider',mb:3},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Tabs,{value:currentTab,onChange:handleTabChange,variant:"scrollable",scrollButtons:"auto",allowScrollButtonsMobile:true,"aria-label":"movie detail tabs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tab,{label:"Th\xF4ng tin phim"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tab,{label:"B\xECnh lu\u1EADn"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{role:"tabpanel",hidden:currentTab!==0,children:currentTab===0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MovieInfo,{movie:movie}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RelatedMovies,{movies:relatedMovies})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{role:"tabpanel",hidden:currentTab!==1,children:currentTab===1&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CommentSection,{movieId:movie._id})})]});};export default MovieDetail;
